definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The sink is broken in the one downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 楼下那间的下水管坏了。

sentences.english: In cotton and wool processing, short length fibers may clog sewers.
sentences.chinese: 在棉毛生产中，短纤维可能堵塞下水管道。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an improved bending section of a sewer pipe, which is water storing bend.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种改良后的下水管弯曲部，即贮水弯。

sentences.english: The workers are unblocking the sewer to prevent the leakage of dirty water.
sentences.chinese: 工人们正在疏通下水管道，防止脏水外泄。

sentences.english: She knows to stay away from bad plumbing and vandalism.
sentences.chinese: 她想远离糟糕的下水管和故意破坏的行为。

sentences.english: Get a head start on spring run off by clearing gutters and down spouts of excess snow and ice.
sentences.chinese: 清洁檐沟和下水管过多的冰和雪来给融雪引流。

sentences.english: One day I was trying to clear a blocked drain.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我试图清理堵住的下水管。

sentences.english: I walked home via the aqueduct.
sentences.chinese: 随后，我穿过下水管道，回了家。

sentences.english: The drainpipe is choked up with rubbish.
New water-treatment plants were built and sewage pipes laid.
sentences.chinese: 新的污水处理厂和下水管道被建立了。

definition: drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
